alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 29 at 3:30PM MST until January 02 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM FRIDAY TO 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of one to three feet, with locally higher amounts expected in the upper Cottonwoods by Monday morning. * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains I-80 North, Wasatch Mountains South of I-80, Western Uinta Mountains, Wasatch Plateau/Book Cliffs and Central Mountains. * WHEN...From 5 AM Friday to 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A brief lull in snowfall is expected in the central Utah mountains on Saturday, but will pick up again by Sunday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
